woodmulti1.title: Wood Multiplier
woodmulti1.bought: if (!prestigeUpgrades.boosts.woodmulti1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; prestigeUpgrades.boosts.woodmulti1.isBought = true; resources.pp -= prestigeUpgrades.boosts.woodmulti1.pp; prestigeUpgrades.boosts.woodmulti1.level++; prestigeUpgrades.boosts.woodmulti1.pp *= 3.5; updateVisuals();
